item.title: Generalized Lotka-Volterra model
item.description: The model \(\frac{dx_i}{dt}= ax_i+\sum_{j=1}^pb_{ij}x_ix_j\) ## library library('deSolve') ## GLV function lvm <- function(t, x, params){ with(as.list(params, c(x)), { dx <- alpha * x + x * (beta %*% x) list(dx) }) } ## numerical integration n.integrate <- function(time, init.x, model, params){ as.data.frame(ode(init.x, time, model, params)) } ## normalizations TSS <- function(x){ apply(x, 1, function(x)x/sum(x)) } GLV with 3 species alpha <- c(0.1, 0.2, 0.3) beta <- t(matrix(c(-0.5, -0.3 , 0, 0.
